title: SCP-CN-963
content:
[[span_ class="myTitle" style="display: none;"]]机械宇宙[[/span]][[span_ class="myClass" style="display: none;"]]Euclid[[/span]][[span_ class="myRemarks" style="display: none; font-size: 0.7em;"]][[/span]][[span_ class="myPreview" style="display: none;"]]机械隐藏在帷幕之前，齿轮啮合中宇宙演变。[[/span]]
